attributes.action: Obolish all MP expenses and allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Don't let them insult our intelligence!!All expenses & allowances should be obolished full stop!! Stop MPs linning their pockets with our money via avoiding taxes and proffiting from expenses and allowances. sign this petition and also tell your friends now via twitter and facebook now.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
